entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -32.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 06:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -32.2°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -37.4°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
